Html:
Hello,

is it possible to load an Excel file with PHP Excel, which contains macros, some buttons and a hidden sheet? I do not want to edit those items, I just want to load the file, put in some text data and then save it.

I tried a sample, but the macros and the hidden property were lost after saving.
PHPExcel can only save information that it can parse and read: macros and form elements are not supported. Therefore, these are lost when saving. Hidden worksheets are supported.
